attributes.action: Make recreational use of Marijuana legal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister can't stay back and let the open fact that recreational use of marijuana is now seen as a widespread problem.. Only because of the law's that are imposed on it.

Legalisation of weed is inevitable in the near future.

The Gov need's to stand forward and take action.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
